entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
